doc.field: Vers la Tunisie...Sur le "Kairouan" (A Trip to Tunisia on the Kairouan)
Vers la Tunisie...Sur le "Kairouan" (A Trip to Tunisia on the Kairouan)

A page entitled 'The jobs of Tunisians (Les occupations des Tunisiens).' From the left clockwise: clippings of a woman begging, artisans weaving, a postcard of a group of people, and a group at a restaurant (Please note: This material has been digitized in its entirety and contains racist and culturally insensitive remarks).
